solution_line_template: Skyler wrote {hit_songs} + {more_than_hit_songs} = <<{hit_songs}+{more_than_hit_songs}={top_100_songs}>>{top_100_songs} songs that made it on the top 100.
He wrote {hit_songs} - {fewer_than_hit_songs} = <<{hit_songs}-{fewer_than_hit_songs}={never_released_songs}>>{never_released_songs} songs that were never released.
So, Skyler wrote a total of {hit_songs} + {top_100_songs} + {never_released_songs} = <<{hit_songs}+{top_100_songs}+{never_released_songs}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs.
